meta.title: Sahara Brass - Precision Brass Components | Manufacturing Excellence
meta.description: Leading precision brass component manufacturer serving automotive, HVAC, and industrial sectors with high-quality engineering solutions.

cta.title: Ready to Experience Precision Manufacturing?
cta.subtitle: Transform your project with our expert brass component solutions and unmatched engineering capabilities.

items.answer: We accommodate orders from small prototype runs to large-scale production, with flexible minimum order quantities starting at 100 units.
items.question: What are your minimum order requirements?

items.answer: Typical lead times range from 2-6 weeks depending on component complexity and order volume. Rush services are available for urgent projects.
items.question: What are your typical production lead times?

items.answer: We maintain ISO 9001:2015 and Six Sigma certification, ensuring rigorous quality control processes and consistent precision in every component.
items.question: How do you guarantee component quality?

items.answer: Our engineering team offers full customization, from initial design consultation to prototype development and final production.
items.question: Can you create custom brass components?

items.answer: We work with multiple brass alloys including C360, C260, and C464, selecting the optimal material for each specific application.
items.question: What brass materials do you use?
